segments.text: Over on the left, two children are clearly up to no good.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is balanced on a two-step stool, reaching into an open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got his hand deep in a jar labeled "COOKIE JAR" – oh, the delight!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks incredibly wobbly, its legs splayed out at an odd angle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It really seems like it could tip backward at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him is reaching up, her palm open, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're a perfect little team of conspirators, aren't they?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their focus is entirely on those sweet treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they'll manage to get away with it unnoticed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a daring feat, especially with the stool looking so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall and hurt himself or break that plate he's holding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a classic childhood caper, full of innocent mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR
